name: Domain Search
description: Domain availability, bulk checks, TLD info, socials, and offline-first suggestions via domain-search-mcp.

qwenMode.description: AI inference mode for suggest_domains_smart. Default: disabled.

qwenEndpoint.description: When qwenMode=custom, the inference endpoint URL.

pricingApiBaseUrl.description: Optional pricing backend (must be public HTTPS; domain-search-mcp blocks localhost/private ranges).
